comment._content: Here is a story about a B&O wreck at Terra Cotta station in Washington, but the date was 12/31/06; why would it be mixed in with photos from 1912? query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9803E2DC1331E7... Here is a map of where the Terra Cotta station was (not sure if that is what we are looking at or not); looks like its not far from the Naval Observatory. www.topozone.com/map.asp?lat=38.9508333333&lon=-77.00...

comment.author: 87606660@N00
comment._content: They don't seem to match up: the accident reported in the article happened in December and the photo appears to have been taken in the summer.
